ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: When I am feeling bad (feeling an unpleasant emotion), I cannot find the right words to describe those feelings.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5= Slightly Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: When I am feeling bad, I cannot tell whether I am sad, angry, or scared.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5= Slightly Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I tend to ignore how I feel.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5= Slightly Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: When I am feeling good (feeling a pleasant emotion), I cannot find the right words to describe those feelings.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5= Slightly Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: When I am feeling good, I cannot tell whether I am happy, excited, or amused.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5= Slightly Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I prefer to just let my feelings happen in the background, rather than focus on them.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5= Slightly Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: When I am feeling bad, I cannot talk about those feelings in much depth or detail.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5= Slightly Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: When I am feeling bad, I cannot make sense of those feelings.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5= Slightly Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I do not pay attention to my emotions.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5= Slightly Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: When I am feeling good, I cannot talk about those feelings in much depth or detail.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5= Slightly Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: When I am feeling good, I cannot make sense of those feelings.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5= Slightly Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: Usually, I try to avoid thinking about what I am feeling.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5= Slightly Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: When something bad happens, it is hard for me to put into words how I am feeling.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5= Slightly Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: When I am feeling bad, I get confused about what emotion it is.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5= Slightly Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I prefer to focus on things I can actually see or touch, rather than my emotions.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5= Slightly Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: When something good happens, it is hard for me to put into words how I am feeling.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5= Slightly Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: When I am feeling good, I get confused about what emotion it is.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5= Slightly Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I do not try to be in touch with my emotions.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5= Slightly Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: When I am feeling bad, if I try to describe how I am feeling I do not know what to say.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5= Slightly Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: When I am feeling bad, I am puzzled by those feelings.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5= Slightly Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: It is not important for me to know what I am feeling.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5= Slightly Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: When I am feeling good, if I try to describe how I am feeling I do not know what to say.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5= Slightly Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: When I am feeling good, I am puzzled by those feelings.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5= Slightly Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: It is strange for me to think about my emotions.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5= Slightly Agree; 6= Agree; 7= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: Negative Difficulty identifying feelings (N-DIF)
Notes: Sum items 2, 8, 14, 20

ElementDescription: Positive Difficulty identifying feelings (P-DIF)
Notes: Sum items 5, 11, 17, 23

ElementDescription: Negative Difficulty describing feelings (N-DDF)
Notes: Sum items 1, 7, 13, 19

ElementDescription: Positive Difficulty describing feelings (P-DDF)
Notes: Sum items 4, 10, 16, 22

ElementDescription: General-Externally orientated thinking (G-EOT)
General Difficulty identifying feelings (G-DIF)
Notes: Sum N-DIF and P-DIF subscales

ElementDescription: General Difficulty describing feelings (G-DDF)
Notes: Sum N-DDF and P-DDF subscales

ElementDescription: Negative Difficulty appraising feelings (N-DAF)
Notes: Sum N-DIF and N-DDF subscales

ElementDescription: Positive Difficulty appraising feelings (P-DAF)
Notes: Sum P-DIF and P-DDF subscales

ElementDescription: General Difficulty appraising feelings (G-DAF)
Notes: Sum N-DIF, P-DIF, N-DDF and P-DDF subscales

ElementDescription: Alexithymia (ALEXI) Total Score
Notes: Sum all items
